structure.unit: Inspection Of Boilers, Air Tanks, Etc. Licenses Of Engineers, Firemen, And Operators Of Hoisting Machinery

law.text: No person shall engage in the business of a master pipefitter, or work as a journeyman or apprentice pipefitter or work as a refrigeration technician or work as a fire protection sprinkler system contractor or as a sprinkler fitter unless he is lawfully licensed under the provisions of section eighty-five.
